I should probably stop flooding here with useless talk, but I just want to say: first, lol. Panta, if you created an account just to say that, I like your style. Secondly, your typical comments are funny in a sense they turn all comment sections into a cesspool of fuckery, including this one, and it always gives me a good laugh. But yeah, maybe ease up on the kik spam. That's like going to an abortion clinic to pick up girls. Plus has anyone here actually contacted you through kik? And lastly, Dragon Ball > Fairy Tail any day. Personally I am a Dragon Ball fan and I'm extremely aware of how inconsistent and imperfect it is, but Fairy Tail is far worse. I've never seen a shonen series with an author so adamant with making sure no main heroes die and stay dead. Dei ex machina happen left and right. And the fan service is at a whole 'nother level. Lucy always getting naked or needing a change of clothes each arc? A dragon that removes clothes? A guy that stimulates pleasure? Really?
Say what u want but its your opinion. I will try to change my comment content to soothe your weak nerves though

Fairy Tail at its peak (which was a while ago) never came close to touching Dragon Ball. Fairy Tail is true garbage and only people who are either complete idiots or slack-jawed teenagers that never watched an ecchi anime before are the ones that make up its fanbase. Natsu is a bland-ass piece of shit, cookie-cutter anime protagonist with nothing unique going on. Your devotion to poorly imitating him shows how little you actually know about anime at all. And yes, your "comments" count as spam if they're the same every time, saying that you're gonna beat up whoever is raping the girl in the hentai. Also, constantly asking people to add you on kik is a form of solicitation. I'm not going to tell you to kill yourself, but just get the fuck off of this site already, you eyesore.
I wont ask about kik but i can comment. And its fine if you dont like my guild. I dont care. Its your opinion. But im sure as hell alot better than stupid dragonball.
Natsu Faggot stop spamming please.

Plus, you do spam. You constantly ask people to add you on kik (which I didn't even know was still prevalent at this time). A place where people come just to bust a nut or flick the bean and you're asking them to message you. That's creepy. The only thing creepier than your die hard commitment to role-playing and you favoring all the Fairy Tail stuff you constantly criticize and coming back to message. Besides my opinionated thoughts on your actions and my feelings towards Fairy Tail, everything else is a fact.

I don't hate you; more like I pity you. The real you. Natsu Dragneel the fictional character and everything else in Fairy Tail on the other hand, I do hate. I hate the entire series, and this is coming from someone that watched and read all of it so they could make a fair judgment. The only good thing that came from the series is the hentai, especially Tamagoro and Ando Hiroyuki's stuff. That's all.
